text: there are risks when it comes to
building a business
but there are also opportunities ahead
opportunities which could be solved
through technology
[Music]
i believe the ability to protect the
people we love and businesses we've
worked hard for
shouldn't be an unaffordable luxury
[Music]
and so i decided to build sunday growing
up i got inspired watching insurance and
reinsurance companies manage various
risks in an ever-changing global risk
landscape
looking at thailand specifically i
realized there's so much potential to
use technology
to help make insurance more customizable
to individuals needs
we are modernizing the insurance market
in thailand by using the power of
introtec
running on aws our company can precisely
measure the financial risk of a broader
range of events
making us flexible to provide any type
of insurance plan
to any type of customer making insurance
more affordable
and accessible sunday is able to
virtually connect pharmacists
gps and medical specialists to patients
making sure they can receive
prescribed medication at their doorstep
inclusion programs are important to us
here at sunday we recruit people from
diverse backgrounds from tech
healthcare insurance financial services
and more
experience is not all we look for we
recruit and nurture young graduates
it gives us the opportunity to hear
their fresh perspectives
while nurturing them it's a safe
environment for anyone to voice their
opinions
no one should feel uncomfortable or
undervalued
everyone plays a part in the company's
innovation journey
[Music]
being able to watch my vision turn into
reality inspires me to keep going
i hope through what i do i am able to
inspire others to build and innovate
we're here for the long term and will
continue to be change makers
in asia
